snippet: The dollar edged up against the yen in early trade on Monday thanks to upbeat U.S. employment data while the euro crept up from multi-month lows, continuing to shake off the impact from the European Central Bank's monetary easing last week....

headline.print_headline: Dollar Gains Versus Yen on Upbeat Jobs Data, Euro Edges Up
headline.main: Dollar Gains Versus Yen on Upbeat Jobs Data, Euro Edges Up

lead_paragraph: The dollar edged up against the yen in early trade on Monday thanks to upbeat U.S. employment data while the euro crept up from multi-month lows, continuing to shake off the impact from the European Central Bank's monetary easing last week.
